name: Sorting Reality
description:
The Object Maker™ is broken! It sometimes creates things that aren't actually real. It is your job to sort the real things (cats, books, trees) from the fake (unicorns, aliens, ghosts). Use the mouse to drag fake objects into the recycling bin, and get as many points as you can!

Made for the Brackeys game jam 2022.1!

Sound effects obtained from zapsplat.com and mixkit.co.

Font from 1001freefonts.com.

All clipart from publicdomainvectors.org.
